content_html: Baitadi, Sept 16: A landslide that occurred this morning at Salsena in Dogadakedar-5 has blocked the Mahakali Highway, disrupting transportation. According to local resident Sher Singh Karki, the landslide is massive and has completely halted traffic along the route. As a result, road connectivity from Baitadi to Mah
